Html:
Hello,

I am doing a project right now and I don't need a few maps as Latvia or Google in Chinese language. So, I have a question, how I can remove or add a map to GMap.NET.Core project?

I've tried to delete LatviaMapProvider.cs and a line from GMapProvider.cs file
public static readonly LatviaMapProvider LatviaMap = LatviaMapProvider.Instance;
but I get an error:
1>------ Build started: Project: GMap.NET.Core, Configuration: Debug Any CPU ------
1>C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\Microsoft.Common.targets(1578,5): warning MSB3245: Could not resolve this reference. Could not locate the assembly "System.Data.SQLite". Check to make sure the assembly exists on disk. If this reference is required by your code, you may get compilation errors.
1>D:\Ugnius\robotika\mapss\GMap.NET.Core\GMap.NET.CacheProviders\SQLitePureImageCache.cs(17,22,17,28): error CS0234: The type or namespace name 'SQLite' does not exist in the namespace 'System.Data' (are you missing an assembly reference?)
========== Build: 0 succeeded, 1 failed, 0 up-to-date, 0 skipped ==========
What should I do that it'd work?
